+1 for removing it; it's an old thing that was put in place to have the different seasons (see here) but was later removed. I can only assume the view was accidentally left there. :)

body:
+1 for removing it; it's an old thing that was put in place to have the different seasons (see [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/commit/3d2298a8f4b6945a3112a9be2ff182ad3a770383)) but was later [removed](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/commit/e14322e421d3ab2b540db9170894182de2120177). I can only assume the view was accidentally left there. :)
Do you want to take this?
